SKT_FIRST.name: Aqua Sphere
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Waterspout
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to grant a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to all allies. The barrier strength is proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。\n味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を付与する。自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>が高いほどシールド量がUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시키고, <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 부여합니다. 실드량은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 높을수록 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。\n有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>,并有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率使全体友军获得<color=#28d9ed>护盾</color>效果。自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>越高,则护盾量越高。

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\nシールド強化

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Removes all debuffs from the caster
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 自分のすべての弱体効果解除
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 解除自身的所有弱化效果

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Grand Blue Punishment
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: グランブルー・パニッシュメント
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and grants the caster increased <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. \nDamage dealt increases in proportion to the number of <color=#28d9ed>debuffs</color> on the target. \nIf this attack kills the enemy, the caster gains an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>効果命中</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。\nこの攻撃は対象の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>の数が多いほどダメージがUPし、敵を倒した時<color=#28d9ed>追加ターン</color>を獲得する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>효과 적중</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.\n이 공격은 대상이 보유한 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>가 많을수록 피해가 증가하고, 적을 처치하면 <color=#28d9ed>추가 턴</color>을 획득합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,使自身<color=#28d9ed>效果命中</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n此攻击的目标附带的<color=#28d9ed>弱化效果</color>越多,则该技能的伤害越高,且若击杀敌人,则获得<color=#28d9ed>额外回合</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, deals fixed damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> of the target's Max Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>8%</color>の固定ダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#fff95f>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상에게 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> 만큼의 고정 피해를 입힙니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携收尾效果</color>:攻击后,对目标造成相当于其生命值上限<color=#28d9ed>8%</color>的固定伤害。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
